message.body: Hey- you said you might be interested in some books ?ï¿¼
Also, I'm starting an arts writing copy editing co
I've had a few clients and recently have had enough that I began making it more official-
Would you be interested in pt here and there copy editing assignments- mainly grad art history papers?
This is in a few months. I just do track changes and light content reviews. I've been charging $30 for 10 pg papers, which is very cheap of course
Far below standard free lance copy editing fees.
But I want to start cheap and then hike up prices once I have a strong client base. What books do you have?!
I Have the scarlet letter and the great gatsby but I'll totally take second copies of all those books if you don't want Them
Anyway, if you'd be interested in pt small here and there paid gigs in future, let me know - maybe we could meet about it in a month when my site is finished
Sure!! And glad you'll take the books
I will have more- more pictures soon !!
Awesome ! You know where I live ! Haha
K! No pictures even needed! Tell me when and where to pick them up, and I'll come get them
We have a huge empty living room thirsty for books
